text: Stalker has several different meanings: *A person who stalks *The name of a novel by Boris and Arkady Strugatsky. The novel was called Roadside Picnic and was written in 1972. *A short story based on the novel, called Stalker *A 1979 movie by Andrei Tarkovsky, called Stalker based on the novel Roadside Picnic *S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl, a computer game
title: Stalker
